Village Street with Carts and Horses

Title
Village Street with Carts and Horses
Object type
Drawing
Genre
Village, Town and Cityscape
Date
ca. 1600
Height (cm)
16.9
Width (cm)
28.9
Support
Paper
Drawing medium
Pen and brown ink, blue-gray wash, with a line of brown wash bordering it on all sides
Further inscription
"L.834-120 x WE Peter Breughel / W. Esdaile" (in Esdaile's hand); "T Thane" (probably in Thane's own handwriting); "No. 1398"; "no. 9"
Our attribution
Jan Brueghel the Elder
Other attribution authorities
Bailey/Walker cat. #CAME.FM.4
Bailey/Walker
CAME.FM.4
Collection type
Public
Location (collection)
Fitzwilliam Museum
Location or most recent sale notes
PD.210-1963
Bibliography
Wurzbach 1910, p. 536, nr. 103, 9, p. 541, nr. 7; Cambridge/Montreal 1952, nr. 10; Cambridge 1958, nr. 5; Rotterdam/Amsterdam 1961-62, nr. 25; Washington/New York 1986-87, nr. 22; Limouze 1990, p. 243, note 115; Essen/Vienna 1997-98, p. 448-9, nr. 157, ill.
Exhibition history
Cambridge/Montreal 1952, Nr. 10|Cambridge 1958, nr. 5|Rotterdam/Amsterdam 1961-62, nr. 25|Washington/New York 1986-87, under nr. 22|Essen/Vienna 1997-98, nr. 157
Provenance
18th century to 19th centuryEngland LondonThomas Dimsdale (Lugt 2426)
1834England LondonWilliam Esdaile (Lugt 2617
Sale of Esdaile Christie's (probably) Lot #568 or 569
Bought by Heath
May 25 1846Sale of Th. Thane Sotehby's Lot #145
Jun 21 1854Sale of Samuel Woodburne Christie's (probably) Lot #1166 or 1402
1963England CambridgeBequeathed by Sir Bruce to Fitzwilliam Museum
Genre
Village, Town and Cityscape
Tags
Animals, Horse, Village, Cart, Coach, Road
